quoteFirst: Then he went into the Criterion bar and sat down. The clock showed
quoteLast: . His piece was advertised to start at eight-thirty precisely. The Criterion Bar is never empty, but it has its moments of lassitude, and seventeen minutes to nine is one of them.
title: A Great Man: A Frolic
author: Bennett, Arnold, 1867-1931
